text:
I'd be happy to help you add messages to ensure affordability after 10,000 files have been deleted. However, I don't see any code in your message. Could you please share the code you'd like me to modify?

Once you provide the code, I can help you add appropriate messages that might include:
- Payment plan options
- Reduced pricing tiers
- Free tier availability
- Financial assistance programs
- Alternative payment methods

Please paste your code, and I'll help you implement these user-friendly payment messages.
